How to Install mon-contrib on debian

  • Home
  • debian
  • mon-contrib

Today in this tutorial, I’ll show you how you can install mon-contrib on debian with and without using the command line.

Introduction

Installing mon-contrib on debian is very easy. And with the help of this tutorial, you will be able to easily install, update and uninstall mon-contrib in just a few steps.

In this tutorial I’ll show you four methods to install mon-contrib, the methods are using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic. All these methods require you to have an active and stable internet connection and sudo permission.

Install mon-contrib Using apt

To install mon-contrib in debian using apt, you will need to run the apt update command first to get the updated list of packages from the repositories.

Copy the command given below and paste it in the command line, then press enter. If you are using the sudo command for the first time then you might also need to enter your root password.

sudo apt update

After you have updated the package list using apt, you can now install mon-contrib using the apt install command. To do that use the command given below.

sudo apt -y install mon-contrib

The installation of mon-contrib might take a little bit of time depending upon your internet connection and machine configuration.

Install mon-contrib Using apt-get

To install mon-contrib using apt-get in debian, you will need to first update the package list using the apt-get update command. Copy, paste, and enter the command given below in the command line.

sudo apt-get update

After updating the package lists, use the apt-get install command given below to install mon-contrib.

sudo apt-get -y install mon-contrib

Install mon-contrib Using Synaptic

To install mon-contrib using Synaptic you will need to first install Synaptic, you can do that by following the instructions from here. After installing synaptic follow the steps below to install mon-contrib on your debian using Synaptic.

You can open synaptic by clicking on the menu icon then searching for synaptic or you can open the command line and enter the command given below –

sudo synaptic

After synaptic opens, click on the search icon and search for mon-contrib. This will display the mon-contrib package in the package window, now to install mon-contrib, click on the checkbox that is on the left side.

Then click on Mark for Installation, this will select the mon-contrib package for installation, now to install it click on the Apply button, you will get a summary window where click on the apply button again to start the download of mon-contrib.

If the download and installation are successful then the checkmark option will turn green.

Install mon-contrib Using aptitude

To install mon-contrib on debian using aptitude, you will need to first install Aptitude in your debian. To install Aptitude follow the instructions here. Once you have aptitude installed proceed to the installation of mon-contrib.

Now you will need to first update your package lists from the repositories, use the apt update command for that, after that update the package list of aptitude using the aptitude update command.

sudo apt update sudo aptitude update

After updating the package list of aptitude, install mon-contrib using the command aptitude install mon-contrib.

sudo aptitude -y install mon-contrib

How to Upgrade mon-contrib on debian

If you want to upgrade the mon-contrib package on your debian to its latest version then here’s how you can do that using apt, apt-get, aptitude, and synaptic.

Upgrade mon-contrib using Apt & Apt-get

To upgrade mon-contrib to its latest version using apt or apt-get, you will need to open the terminal then run the sudo apt update command to update the package list, after that copy and paste the commands given below to upgrade mon-contrib.

sudo apt install --only-upgrade mon-contrib sudo apt-get install --only-upgrade mon-contrib

Upgrade mon-contrib using Aptitude

To upgrade mon-contrib using aptitude you will need to again run the update command to update the package list, use command sudo aptitude update to do that. After that run the command given below to upgrade mon-contrib.

sudo aptitude -y full-upgrade mon-contrib

Upgrade mon-contrib using Synaptic

To upgrade mon-contrib using synaptic open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or by going to the menu and searching for synaptic.

In synaptic click on the reload button, this will look for updates. After that you will need to search for mon-contrib, now right-click mon-contrib, and click on the mark for upgrade option.

Now to upgrade mon-contrib just click on the apply button, then click on the apply button again in the summary screen.

How To Uninstall mon-contrib on debian

If you want to remove and uninstall mon-contrib from your debian then here’s how you can do that. To remove just mon-contrib, you can use the command that is given below, copy the command, paste it in the command line then press enter.

sudo apt remove mon-contrib

Remove related packages, dependencies & configuration files of mon-contrib

To remove all the related packages, dependencies and configuration files of mon-contrib you can use the command given below.

sudo apt -y purge mon-contrib

Remove mon-contrib using Synaptic Package Manager

You can also uninstall mon-contrib using the synaptic package manager, first open synaptic using the command sudo synaptic or search and open it directly.

After that in synaptic search for mon-contrib, right-click the mon-contrib package and click on the Mark for Complete Removal option. Now to uninstall mon-contrib click on the apply button then in summary click on apply again.

Conclusion

That is how you can install mon-contrib on debian using the command line or using the synaptic package manager. I also showed you how you can uninstall and upgrade mon-contrib using the command line or using the synaptic package manager.

If you need any help regarding the installation of mon-contrib then send me a mail at netmikoblog@gmail.com, thank you.
